about.title: Backend Developer
about.slogan: Small upgrades lead to great systems.
about.description: Specialized in large-scale system development. Focused on providing simple solutions to complex problems. Like the systems, I am in constant improvement and learning.

projects.name: Meloday
projects.description: A website that offers a different song for each day of the year.
projects.learnt: Setting up the YouTube API, handling large volumes of data, getting familiar with Svelte and Vite.

projects.name: Cuida Backend
projects.description: Platform for the visibility of Animal Shelters in Cúcuta, Colombia.
projects.learnt: Setting up the RESTful API for Cuida's front-end, the admin panel, creating middleware, managing roles and databases.

experience.title: Backend Developer
experience.description: Highlights include the creation of a queuing system with RabbitMQ to notify events between various company systems, modular APIs with Scoop for dynamic georeferencing and role-based authentication.
experience.extra: Working with Hexagonal and DDD architectures, configuring Docker environments, handling ORMs like Hibernate, scripting with PHP, and applying SOLID principles; under SCRUM and Kanban methodologies.

achievements.title: EFSET English C1
achievements.description: Latest results from the 90-minute exam (Reading, listening, writing, and speaking).

achievements.title: B2 English Certificate
achievements.description: After a year of effort, I completed modules B1 and B2 in English at Universal Language Center.
achievements.extra: Through daily virtual classes, exercises, readings, and weekly exams I obtained the certification in just one year.

achievements.title: 3rd Place - Training Camp of Los Santanderes
achievements.description: Can you learn what you need for a programming marathon in only one week? Yes! After this wonderful event that lasted three weeks learning advanced algorithm and math concepts we achieved third place.
achievements.extra: In teams of three, we held a four-hour marathon where 'Agileware', the only team of two people and being novices, managed to come third among 16 teams!

hobbies.name: Programming
hobbies.description: Always seeking new challenges or something innovative.

hobbies.name: Video Games
hobbies.description: Super competitive, although playing with friends is better.

hobbies.name: Reading
hobbies.description: Aficionado of novels about dystopias, science fiction, horror, and suspense.

hobbies.name: Training
hobbies.description: The body is a temple; it must be cared for and admired.
